scripts.build: npm run -w front-end build && npm run -w back-end build
scripts.lint-server: npm run -w back-end lint-fix && npm run -w back-end server
scripts.lint-serve: npm run -w front-end lint-fix && npm run -w front-end serve
scripts.lint: npm run -w front-end lint && npm run -w back-end lint
scripts.lint-fix: npm run -w front-end lint-fix && npm run -w back-end lint-fix
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w front-end typecheck && npm run -w back-end typecheck
scripts.up: taze major -I && npm run -w front-end up && npm run -w back-end up
